title: Nanocluster catalysts for the electrochemical conversion of carbon dioxide
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00533C, Perspective
Devina Thasia Wijaya, Annisa Luthfiah, Chan Woo Lee
Nanocluster materials for CO2 electroreduction are analyzed with a focus on rational design, considering size effects and stronger interactions with reaction intermediates, electrolytes, and support materials.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
